DESCRIPTION: #yGathering a #yPyro #yBuddy places it into your centremost #yStorage #yCentre.
#yPyro #yBuddies can be #yGathered into your #yStorage #yCentres whereupon they will #yGenerate #ySync #yBoons based on their #yType.
#yIngesting #ySync #yBoons activates one of your #yDestiny #yReactors based on the number and type of #yIngested #ySync #yBoons.
#yBoost #yPoints increment the #yDouble #yTricks of your #yDestiny #yReactors whenever you #yGather a #yPyro #yBuddy.
#ySync #yBoons activate your #yDestiny #yReactors when #yIngested and supply a passive effect to your #yPyro #yBuddies.

After #yRunning a certain amount of times, #pescape #pcombat. If you're fighting a boss, deal damage based on the boss's Max HP to ALL enemies instead. #rEscaping #rgets #rharder #revery #rtime #ryou #rescape.
LOL they do something or whatever whooo cares
Cannot be played unless unlocked by #yThe #yKey.
